about.backend: Although I have experience in backend development using Express.js with MongoDB, I am particularly passionate about frontend development. I am currently specializing in and have experience with React and TypeScript.

about.happy: It would be a pleasure to get involved in your projects and assist by applying all the knowledge and experience I have to find proper solutions!

experience.Vilisov: An ambitious company from Tyumen creates two flagship products: an electronic menu
